betterquesting:10.desc:8:
There are several AE items that aren't particularly useful, but probably deserve mention, so here they are:

§lCertus Tanks§r: They hold 32B and are portable and easy to make.

§lView Cell§r: Format in a Cell Workbench to filter what you see in a terminal (when they're installed in it)

§lCertus/Nether Quartz Cutting Knive§rs: Right-click to open interface and choose a name. The press can be used in the Inscriber to name stuff without using an anvil. You can also rename p2p tunnels and interfaces in world with the knife.

§lME Block Container§r: Holds only one type of item, but the amount of a 64k drive. Can place the item in world, or replace in a 1x1 or 3x3 area. Blocks replaced will be dumped in world. This will be horizontal or vertical depending on which side of a block you select. Shift-right-click air to change mode, right-click a block to activate mode.

§lCharged Quartz Fixture§r: Emits light at the same level as a torch, but fancier.

§lLight Detecting Fixture§r: Emits redstone signal based on light. Since it only starts at 7, it's not as useful as the Light Sensor.

§lME Upgrade (Tier 1/2/3)§r: If you're an OC person, there are 3 upgrades you can make to add access to your network from robots and drones.
T1: 0.5 access point range
T2: Normal access point range
T3: Unlimited range, any dim

§lEntropy Manipulator§r: Changes grass/dirt/dried dirt into each other, or starts fires. Or melts ice. Useless.

§lMatter Cannon§r: Shoots Matter Balls made in the Matter Condenser. Put it in an ME Chest or Drive and put items in a Terminal to fill. Decent I guess? But it destroys blocks every time you use it, so... Well, I guess you could use it with Paint Balls?

§lColor Applicator§r: Use dye items or Paint Balls (more efficient) to dye stuff. You can dye cables, or anything Forge-compatible, like wool or glass. Place items inside like the Matter Cannon. You can cycle through the colors by holding shift and right-clicking, or scrolling the mouse wheel. If you use snow balls, you can remove paint instead. You can also use it in a dispenser.

§6§lWalrus§r: It's a walrus, what were you expecting?
